headline: Clorox (CLX) Valuation Check After Mixed Returns And ERP-Driven Efficiency Hopes
summary: What recent returns say about Clorox stock Clorox (CLX) has delivered mixed share price moves recently, with a 9.6% gain over the past month, a 3.3% decline over the past 3 months, and a 28.2% decline over the past year. See our latest analysis for Clorox. Clorox's recent 9.6% 1 month share price return contrasts with a 28.2% 1 year total shareholder return decline, suggesting recent momentum has picked up after a weaker longer term stretch and shifting views on its risk and growth...
